sql.insertDtlSql: INSERT INTO data_asset_platform.meta_data_table_view_function_relationship_dtl ( obj_id, obj_schema, obj_name, obj_type, obj_nargs, source_obj_id, collect_time ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
